steps.text: Go to the abandoned shrine northeast of ◀Konda Village▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Konda_Village▷
Carry out the investigation at the abandoned shrine
(Optional) Interact with the large ◀Sky Kitsune Statue▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sky_Kitsune_Statue▷ to the east.
Interact with any ◀Mysterious Shadow▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mysterious_Shadow▷.
Continue the investigation at the abandoned shrine (Mysterious Shadow locations in ◀Gallery▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sacrificial_Offering#Gallery▷)
Talk to the three ◀Mysterious Shadows▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mysterious_Shadow▷ twice until they teleport to the three kitsune statues surrounding a small stone platform.
The first shadow is in front of a small shrine near the entrance to the area. She will teleport to a kitsune statue along the road.

The second shadow is in front of the main shrine with the ◀Electroculus▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electroculus▷. She will teleport to the Sky Kitsune Statue located southeast of the platform with the three kitsune statues.
The third shadow is on the roof of the shrine. She will teleport to the trees south of the main shrine, passing the platform with the three kitsune statues.
Once all three shadows are at the platform, they will vanish and spawn 3 ◀Exquisite Chests▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Exquisite_Chest▷.
Investigate the platform to obtain ◀Sacred Sakura Cleansing Summary▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sacred_Sakura_Cleansing_Summary▷.
Head to the ◀Grand Narukami Shrine▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Grand_Narukami_Shrine_(Subarea)▷ to investigate
Talk to ◀Inagi Hotomi▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Inagi_Hotomi▷ to obtain ◀Memento Lens▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Memento_Lens▷.
Return to the abandoned shrine and use the Memento Lens to investigate

Observe the ◀Earth Kitsune Statues▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Earth_Kitsune_Statue▷ using the lens to witness several scenes featuring the masked miko and an old man, the previous rite's worker. Three of the scenes feature the required lines; the other scenes are optional to watch:
At the ◀hokora▶◁https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/hokora▷ (little shrine) near the torii.
To the right (when facing it) of the main shrine.
Next to the Sky Kitsune statue.
Near the three Kitsune statues where you got the chests.
Further to the east of the main shrine.
South of the three Kitsunes, near where the Mysterious Shadow was in the trees.
Recite the sacred words in front of the Sky Kitsune Statue
Obtain the ◀ward▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ward_(Sacrificial_Offering)▷
Find the barrier
The barrier is in a cave north of a small lake located south of Grand Narukami Shrine.
There are two entrances to the cave:

One entrance has a locked gate, with an ◀Electroculus▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electroculus▷ behind it. It requires a ◀Rust-Worn Key▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Rust-Worn_Key▷, which can be found on top of a table under the well in Konda Village.
The second can be found to the west of the locked gate. It has ◀Electro Crystalflies▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electro_Crystalfly▷ flying near the entrance.
Destroy the barrier

The puzzle is solved similarly to the ◀previous quest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/A_Strange_Story_in_Konda#Puzzle▷. Adjust the Electro lanterns with the corresponding number of petals to form the pattern given by the shrine emblem. Adjust the central lantern to "2", and the other 3 lanterns to "3".
Defeat the ◀Mysterious Samurai▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ochimusha▷.
Talk to ◀Hanachirusato▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hanachirusato▷
